  "Broker Comment" : "This disclosure is in response to an amendment made on Mr. Ratay's Form U-5 by MSI Financial Services Inc. (\"MSI\").  Mr. Ratay was not aware of this complaint until MSI filed an amendment to his Form U-5.  Mr. Ratay was employed with MSI from July 2015 to April 2017.  At the time of the alleged transaction, April 2016, Mr. Ratay was a sales assistant providing customer assistance, marketing and administrative support.  Mr. Ratay's manager was responsible for making investment recommendations to customers.  Mr. Ratay recalls attending meetings between his manager and the client.  However, Mr. Ratay did not discuss or recommend the client purchase a new insurance policy with the proceeds of an existing variable annuity and variable life insurance policy."
